member.name: T:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl
member.summary: A custom UserControl for media playback using VLC, integrated with a playlist, progress bar, control bar, and subtitle functionality. Provides methods for playing, pausing, stopping, seeking, and controlling volume, as well as handling fullscreen mode, repeat modes (including random), and mouse interactions. Implements IPlayer interface for media control operations.
PlayerControl

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.MouseSleeps
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration in seconds after which the control bar and progress bar are hidden if the mouse is inactive.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Repeat
member.summary: Gets or sets the repeat mode for playback (e.g., None, Current, All, Random).

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Playlist
member.summary: Gets or sets the playlist view associated with the player.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.ProgressBar
member.summary: Gets or sets the progress bar control for displaying playback progress.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.ControlBar
member.summary: Gets or sets the control bar for media playback controls.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.SeekDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration for seeking forward or backward.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.PlayerStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets the current status of the media player (e.g., Play, Pause, Stop).

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.CurrentTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the current playback position of the media.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Handle
member.summary: Gets the handle to the player control (not implemented).
member.exception: Thrown as this property is not implemented.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the player is in a playing state (not implemented).
member.exception: Thrown as this property is not implemented.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.IsPaused
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the player is in a paused state (not implemented).
member.exception: Thrown as this property is not implemented.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.IsStoped
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the player is in a stopped state (not implemented).
member.exception: Thrown as this property is not implemented.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.SubtitleVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the subtitle control. Displays an error message if no subtitle file is selected when attempting to show subtitles.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume level of the media player (0 to 100).

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Mute
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the audio is muted.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlayerControl.Fullscreen
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the player is in fullscreen mode.

member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes, used for data binding.

member.summary: Sets the system execution state to prevent sleep during playback.

member.summary: Sets up event handlers for control bar buttons (play, stop, next, previous, volume, etc.).

member.name: T:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView
member.summary: A custom ListView control for managing a playlist of video media items. Provides functionality to play, pause, remove, and reorder videos, with support for user interactions like double-click and right-click context menu actions. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged for data binding and uses an ObservableCollection to dynamically update the UI when the playlist changes.
PlaylistView

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.PlayCommand
member.summary: Gets the command to play a selected video.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.PauseCommand
member.summary: Gets the command to pause the currently playing video.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.RemoveCommand
member.summary: Gets the command to remove a video from the playlist.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.MoveToTopCommand
member.summary: Gets the command to move a video to the top of the playlist.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.Videos
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of videos in the playlist and updates the UI.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.CurrentIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the current video, ensuring valid bounds. Returns -1 if the playlist is empty.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.NextIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the next video in the playlist, looping to 0 if at the end. Returns -1 if the playlist is empty.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.PreviousIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the previous video in the playlist, looping to the end if at the start. Returns -1 if the playlist is empty.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.Next
member.summary: Gets the next video in the playlist based on .

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.Previous
member.summary: Gets the previous video in the playlist based on .

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.MoveNext
member.summary: Moves to the next video in the playlist and returns it. Updates and notifies the UI of the change.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.MovePrevious
member.summary: Moves to the previous video in the playlist and returns it. Updates and notifies the UI of the change.

member.name: P:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.Current
member.summary: Gets or sets the current video in the playlist.

member.name: E:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes, used for data binding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The media player used to control video playback.

member.summary: Raises the event to notify the UI of property changes.
member.param: The name of the property that changed.

member.name: M:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.ClearTracks
member.summary: Clears all videos from the playlist and unsubscribes from their events.

member.summary: Checks if a video is already in the playlist based on its URI.
member.returns: True if the video is in the playlist; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.Remove(Thmd.Media.Video)
member.summary: Removes a video from the playlist and adjusts the current index if necessary.
member.returns: The removed video, or null if the video was not found.

member.name: M:Thmd.Controls.PlaylistView.New(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Clears the current playlist to start a new one.
member.param: The name of the new playlist (not currently used).
The description of the new playlist (not currently used).

member.summary: Adds a single video to the playlist and sets up its player and event handlers.
